name: ARPlaneGeometry
desc: A 3D mesh describing the shape of a detected plane in world-tracking AR sessions.

items.name: var vertices: [vector_float3]
items.desc: An array of vertex positions for each point in the plane mesh.

items.name: var textureCoordinates: [vector_float2]
items.desc: An array of texture coordinate values for each point in the plane mesh.

items.name: var triangleCount: Int
items.desc: The number of triangles described by the triangleIndices buffer.

items.name: var triangleIndices: [Int16]
items.desc: An array of indices describing the triangle mesh formed by the plane geometry's vertex data.

items.name: var boundaryVertices: [vector_float3]
items.desc: An array of vertex positions for each point along the plane's boundary.
